attributes.action: Stop the Turn off of the Analogue Television Signal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Analogue Television system should not be turned off as digital television is not reliable and people who do not wish to purchase a box will be unable to watch television, also, many people have several television sets (such as in the kitchen or in the bedroom) and it will be expensive to buy boxes for all of them. in addition, the boxes will cause enviromental damage due to the extra electricity they use.
